title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft with intermixed tabs and spaces, the text does not move as expected.
EB: Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that both lines are indented the same visually. When executing ShiftLeft, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). It is currently confusing because the presence of a stray space prevents the text from shifting.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following:
   <space>
   <tab>some text
   <tab>some text2
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command.

Note that nothing moves as expected.
